snippet: Some Democrats worry the appointment of a Jeff Sessions subordinate to oversee an investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election won't be a clean enough break from the embattled attorney general....

headline.main: Families Aim to Raise $15 Million to Search for Flight 370
headline.print_headline: Families Aim to Raise $15 Million to Search for Flight 370

lead_paragraph: Some Democrats worry the appointment of a Jeff Sessions subordinate to oversee an investigation into Russian interference in the 2016 election won't be a clean enough break from the embattled attorney general.
